entry.title: Open Access Monograph Series: Oriental Institute Miscellaneous Publications
entry.content:
Oriental Institute Miscellaneous Publications

The following titles were published by the Oriental Institute, or by its departments, or by the University of Chicago Press on behalf of the Oriental Institute, or by members of the Oriental Institute Faculty and Staff.  All of them are available in pdf courtesy of the Electronic Publications Initiative of the Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago.
  • Nimrud: The Queens' Tombs. By Muzahim Mahmoud Hussein, translation and initial editing by Mark Altaweel, additional editing and notes by McGuire Gibson. 2016
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • The Mosaics of Khirbet el-Mafjar: Hisham's Palace. By Hamdan Taha and Donald Whitcomb. 2015.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • Digital Epigraphy. By Krisztián Vértes and the Epigraphic Survey. 2014.
    Download eBook Terms of Use
  • Mesopotamian Pottery: A Guide to the Babylonian Tradition in the Second Millennium B.C. By James A. Armstrong and Hermann Gasche, with contributions by Steven W. Cole, Abraham Van As, and Loe Jacobs. Mesopotamian History and Environment II, Memoirs IV. 2014.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • Islamic Bindings & Bookmaking. A Catalogue of an Exhibition in the Oriental Institute Museum, University of Chicago, May 18-August 18, 1981. By Gulnar Bosch, John Carswell, and Guy Petherbridge. Originally published in 1981.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Babylonian Genesis: The Story of Creation. By Alexander Heidel. Originally published in 1951.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Gilgamesh Epic and Old Testament Parallels. By Alexander Heidel. Originally published in 1949.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Egypt through the Stereoscope: A Journey through the Land of the Pharaohs. By James Henry Breasted. Originally published in 1908. Electronic publication in 2010.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Pioneer to the Past: The Story of James Henry Breasted, Archaeologist, Told by His Son Charles Breasted. By Charles Breasted. Reprint of the Charles Scribner's Sons 1943 Edition with New Foreword and Photographs. Published in 2009.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • Settlement and Society: Essays Dedicated to Robert McCormick Adams. Elizabeth C. Stone, editor. Joint Publication with the Cotsen Institute of Archaeology, University of California, Los Angeles. 2007.
  • An Adventure of Great Dimension: The Launching of the Chicago Assyrian Dictionary. Erica Reiner. Originally published in 2002.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Letters from Egypt and Iraq, 1954. Margaret Bell Cameron. Originally published in 2001.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Changing Watercourses in Babylonia: Towards a Reconstruction of the Ancient Environment in Lower Mesopotamia Volume 1. Hermann Gasche and Michel Tanret, editors. Originally published in 1998.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Dating the Fall of Babylon: A Reappraisal of Second-Millennium Chronology. J. A. Armstrong, S. W. Cole, and V. G. Gurzadyan. Originally published in 1998.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Ayla: Art and Industry in the Islamic Port of Aqaba. D. Whitcomb. 1994.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • Letters from Turkey, 1939-1946. G. Maynard. 1994.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • Uch Tepe II: Technical Reports. McG. Gibson, ed. 1990.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • The Research Archives of the Oriental Institute: Introduction and Guide. The Oriental Institute. Originally published in 1990.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Aqaba: "Port of Palestine on the China Sea." D. Whitcomb. 1988.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Egyptology at the Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago. The Oriental Institute. Originally published in 1983.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Feasts for Pharaohs & Kings: A Cookbook by the Oriental Institute Museum, The University of Chicago. Edited and compiled by Anne S. Blomstrom. Originally published in 1983.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Quseir al-Qadim 1980: Preliminary Report. By Donald S. Whitcomb and Janet H. Johnson. Originally published in 1982.
    Download Terms of Use
  • A Guide to the Oriental Institute Museum. Written by Leon Marfoe, edited by Peter T. Daniels and Valerie M. Fargo. Originally published in 1982.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Uch Tepe I: Tell Razuk, Tell Ahmed Al-Mughir, Tell Ajamat. McG. Gibson, ed. 1981.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • Heartland of Cities: Surveys of Ancient Settlement and Land Use on the Central Floodplain of the Euphrates. Robert McC. Adams. Originally published in 1981.
    Download Terms of Use
  • United with Eternity: A Concise Guide to the Monuments of Medinet Habu. William J. Murnane. Originally published in 1980. Download Terms of Use
  • Prehistoric Research in Southeastern Anatolia -- Guneydogu Anadolu Tarihoncesi Arastirmalari. Halet Cambel and Robert J. Braidwood. Originally published in 1980.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Remembrances of the Near East: The Photographs of Bonfils, 1867-1907. The Bonfils Firm.. Originally published in 1980.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Quseir Al-Qadim 1978: Preliminary Report. D. S. Whitcomb and J. H. Johnson. 1979.
    Purchase Download Terms of Use
  • Ancient Textiles from Nubia: Meroitic, X-Group, and Christian Fabrics from Ballana and Qustul. Christa C. Mayer Thurman and Bruce Williams. Originally published in 1979.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Early Hydraulic Civilization in Egypt: A Study in Cultural Ecology. Karl W. Butzer. Originally published in 1976.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Old Babylonian Contracts From Nippur: Selected Texts From the University Museum University of Pennsylvania. Catalogue by Elizabeth C. Stone. Photos by Paul E. Zimansky. Originally published in 1976.
    Download Terms of Use
  • John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Centenary Exhibition: A Productive Collaboration 1919–1935. Originally published in 1974.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Uruk Countryside: The Natural Setting of Urban Societies. Robert McC. Adams and Hans J. Nissen. 1972.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Letters From Mesopotamia: Official, Business, and Private Letters on Clay Tablets from Two Millennia. A. Leo Oppenheim. Originally published in 1967.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Most Ancient Egypt. William C. Hayes. Originally published in 1965.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Land Behind Baghdad: A History of Settlement on the Diyala Plains. Robert McC. Adams. Originally published in 1965.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Ancient Mesopotamia: Portrait of a Dead Civilization. A. Leo Oppenheim. Revised edition completed by Erica Reiner. Originally published in 1964; revised edition in 1977.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Signs and Wonders upon Pharaoh: A History of American Egyptology. John A. Wilson. Originally published in 1964.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Land Behind Baghdad: A History of Settlement on the Diyala Plains. Robert McC. Adams. Originally published in 1965.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Studies Presented to A. Leo Oppenheim, June 7, 1964. R. D. Biggs and J. A. Brinkman, editors. Originally published in 1964.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Most Ancient Verse. Selected and translated by Thorkild Jacobsen and John A. Wilson. Originally published in 1963.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Sumerians: Their History, Culture, and Character. Samuel Noah Kramer. Originally published in 1963.
    Download Terms of Use
  • City Invincible: A Symposium on Urbanization and Cultural Development in the Ancient Near East Held at the Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, December 4-7, 1958. Edited by Carl H. Kraeling & Robert McC. Adams. Originally published in 1960.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Temple of King Sethos I at Abydos, Volume IV: The Second Hypostyle Hall. Copied by Amice M. Calverley, with the assistance of Myrtle F. Broome, and edited by Alan H. Gardiner. Originally published in 1958.
    Download Terms of Use
  • When Egypt Ruled the East. By George Steindorff and Keith C. Seele. Revised by Keith C. Seele. Originally published as second edition in 1957.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Culture of Ancient Egypt: An Interpretation of Ancient Egyptian Culture. By John A. Wilson. Reprinted in 1956.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Standard Operating Procedure for the Assyrian Dictionary. I. J. Gelb. Originally published in 1954.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Third Century Iran: Sapor and Kartir. Martin Sprengling. Originally published in 1953.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Medieval Islam: A Study in Cultural Orientation. Gustave E. von Grunebaum. Originally published in 1953.
    Download Terms of Use
  • A Study of Writing. I. J. Gelb. Originally published in 1952.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Burden of Egypt: An Interpretation of Ancient Egyptian Culture. By John A. Wilson. Originally published in 1951.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Reliefs and Inscriptions from the Tomb of Per-haps: An Oriental Institute Holiday Card. Early 1950s
    Download Terms of Use
  • Kingship and the Gods: A Study of Ancient Near Eastern Religion as the Integration of Society and Nature. By Henri Frankfort. Originally published in 1948.
    Download Terms of Use
  • History of the Persian Empire. Albert Ten Eyck Olmstead. Originally published in 1948.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Intellectual Adventure of Ancient Man: An Essay on Speculative Thought in the Ancient Near East. Henri Frankfort, H. A. Frankfort, John A. Wilson, Thorkild Jacobsen, and William A. Irwin. Originally published in 1946.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Two Queens of Baghdad: Mother and Wife of Harun al-Rashid. Nabia Abbott. Originally published in 1946.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Problem of Ezekiel: An Inductive Study. William A. Irwin. Originally published in 1943.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Aishah: The Beloved of Mohammed. Nabia Abbott. Originally published in 1942.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Rayy Expedition. Erich F. Schmidt. Originally published in 1942.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Expedition to Luristan. Erich F. Schmidt. Originally published in 1941.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Persepolis Expedition. Erich F. Schmidt. Originally published in 1941.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Flights Over Ancient Cities of Iran. Erich F. Schmidt. 1940.
    Download Terms of Use
  • A Political History of Parthia. Neilson C. Debevoise. Originally published in 1938.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Temple of King Sethos I at Abydos, Volume III: The Osiris Complex. Copied by Amice M. Calverley, with the assistance of Myrtle F. Broome, and edited by Alan H. Gardiner. Originally published in 1938.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The History of Early Iran. George G. Cameron. Originally published in 1938.
    Download Terms of Use
  • They Wrote on Clay: The Babylonian Tablets Speak Today. By Edward Chiera. Edited by George G. Cameron. Originally published in 1938.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Syrian Expedition: The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago. The Oriental Institute. Originally published in 1937.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Ancient Egyptian Paintings Selected, Copied, and Described. Volume III: Descriptive Text. By Nina M. Davies with the Editorial Assistance of Alan H. Gardiner. Originally published in 1936.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Ancient Egyptian Paintings Selected, Copied, and Described. Volume II: Descriptive Text. By Nina M. Davies with the Editorial Assistance of Alan H. Gardiner. Originally published in 1936.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Ancient Egyptian Paintings Selected, Copied, and Described. Volume I: Descriptive Text. By Nina M. Davies with the Editorial Assistance of Alan H. Gardiner. Originally published in 1936.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Service in the Memory of James Henry Breasted. Originally published in 1936.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago: Fifth Edition. Originally published between 1936-1946.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Temple of King Sethos I at Abydos, Volume II: The Chapels of Amen-Re', Re'-Harakhti, Ptah, and King Sethos. Copied by Amice M. Calverley, with the assistance of Myrtle F. Broome, and edited by Alan H. Gardiner. Originally published in 1935.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago: Fourth Edition. Originally published in 1935.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Temple of King Sethos I at Abydos, Volume I: The Chapels of Osiris, Isis and Horus. Copied by Amice M. Calverley, with the assistance of Myrtle F. Broome, and edited by Alan H. Gardiner. Originally published in 1933.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Oriental Institute. James Henry Breasted. Originally published in 1933.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago: Third Edition. Originally published in 1931.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Oriental Institute: General Circular No. 2, 1928. Originally published in 1928.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Ancient Records of Assyria and Babylonia Volume 2: Historical Records of Assyria From Sargon to the End. David Luckenbill. Originally published in 1927.
    Download Terms of Use
  • Ancient Records of Assyria and Babylonia Volume 1: Historical Records of Assyria From the Earliest Times to Sargon. Daniel David Luckenbill. Originally published in 1926.
    Download Terms of Use
  • The Oriental Institute: General Circular No. 1, 1926. Originally published in 1926.
    Download Terms of Use
  • History of Assyria. Albert T. Olmstead. Originally published in 1923.
    Download Terms of Use

For an up to date list of all Oriental Institute publications available online see
The Oriental Institute Open Access Publications

And see AWOL's Alphabetical List of Open Access Monograph Series in Ancient Studies
